roleset.name: rise fourfold

example.name: quadruple-v: just transitive
example.text: One person familiar with Georgia-Pacific said the acquisition would more than quadruple the company's debt of almost $3 billion.
example.arg: the company's debt of almost $3 billion.

example.name: quadruple-v: with end point
example.text: That purchase quadrupled Quebecor's annual printing revenue to $750 million.

example.name: quadruple-v: start and end points, ergative
example.text: Genentech Inc. said third-quarter profit more than quadrupled to $11.4 million, or 13 cents a share, from a depressed 1988 third-quarter performance of $5.3 million, or six cents a share.
example.arg: to $11.4 million, or 13 cents a share,
from a depressed 1988 third-quarter performance of $5.3 million, or six cents a share.

example.name: quadrupling-n
example.text: What were the causes and consequences of the quadrupling of the proto-vertebrate genome during the Cambrian, and why wasn't it fatal?

roleset.note: QUADRUPLE-V NOTES: Note the ADV tagging of modifiers such as "almost" or "more than". (from quadruple.01-v)
